entity.name: Streetlives
entity.description: Streetlives is an NYC-based non-profit that empowers unhoused individuals through digital products rooted in lived experience.

projects.name: YourPeer
projects.description: YourPeer provides a resource directory of free support services validated by your peers.

channels.description: Pay with your debit/credit card through this gateway and setup recurring subscriptions.

plans.name: One-off Streetlives donation
plans.description: Each contribution to Streetlives provides a stipend to unhoused people or people who have experienced homelessness. $30 enables up to a half-hour of co-design or consultation to help improve our technology or work in the field to gather, validate, and curate social services data for the whole community's benefit.
